content: Jan 14 Hyatt Hotels Corp said a previously reported malware attack to steal payment card data affected 250 hotels between August 13 and Dec. 8.
name: Hyatt Hotels Corporation
title: UPDATE 3-Hyatt says data breach hit 250 hotels since August

content: Hyatt Hotels Corp said a previously reported malware attack on its payment processing system occurred between August 13 and Dec. 8.
name: Hyatt Hotels Corporation
title: Hyatt says data breach started in August

content: Hyatt Hotels Corp said on Wednesday that its payment processing system was infected with credit-card-stealing malware in an attack discovered three weeks ago  the latest in a series of breaches at hospitality firms.
name: Hyatt Hotels Corporation
title: Hyatt Hotels attacked with payment-card stealing malware

content: Hyatt Hotels Corp said on Wednesday that its payment processing system was infected with credit-card-stealing malware in an attack discovered three weeks ago  the latest in a series of breaches at hospitality firms. | Video
name: Hyatt Hotels Corporation
title: Hyatt Hotels attacked with payment-card stealing malware

content: Dec 23 Hyatt Hotels Corp said on Wednesday that its payment processing system was infected with credit-card-stealing malware in an attack discovered three weeks ago  the latest in a series of breaches at hospitality firms.
name: Hyatt Hotels Corporation
title: UPDATE 3-Hyatt Hotels attacked with payment-card stealing malware

content: Dec 23 Hyatt Hotels Corp on Wednesday asked customers to review payment card statements for possible fraud after it found malicious software in its payment processing systems for hotels it manages.
name: Hyatt Hotels Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Hyatt says payment processing systems breached

content: Dec 23 Hotel operator Hyatt Hotels Corp  said it had identified malware on computers that operate the payment processing systems for Hyatt-managed locations.
name: Hyatt Hotels Corporation
title: Hyatt finds malware at payment processing systems

content: Hyatt Hotels Corp  is in talks to buy U.S. hotel operator Starwood Hotels and Resorts Worldwide Inc  in a cash and stock deal  a source familiar with the matter said.
name: Hyatt Hotels Corporation
title: Hyatt in talks to buy Starwood Hotels

content: * Starwood shares up 5.7 pct   (Changes sourcing  adds analysts' comments  details)

content: Aug 4 Hyatt Hotels Corp reported a lower-than-expected quarterly profit  hurt by lower revenue from its owned and leased hotels and a loss from its hospitality ventures  sending its shares down more than 3 percent in early trading.
name: Hyatt Hotels Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Hyatt profit misses on lower revenue from owned  leased hotels

content: Aug 4 Hyatt Hotels Corp reported a 4 percent fall in quarterly revenue  hurt by lower demand at its owned and leased hotels.
name: Hyatt Hotels Corporation
title: Hyatt second-quarter revenue falls 4 pct
